Tool

NameProfile
ID0
Author(c) 2004 by O.Conrad
Specificationgrid, interactive

Description

Create interactively profiles from a grid based DEM Use left mouse button clicks into a map window to add profile points.A right mouse button click will finish the profile.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
DEM Grid (input)DEM
Values (*)Grid list (optional input)VALUESAdditional values that shall be saved to the output table.
Output
Profile PointsShapes (output)POINTS
Profile LineShapes (output)LINE
(*) optional
